Title: Title
Name: Name
jumpOpenTasks: Go to notes with open tasks
useDefaultConfigs: Use settings from the default profile
File should be in json format: File should be in json format

encryption.change password: Type your password here to change it
encryption.wait: Please wait until the encryption is completed
encryption.errorConfirm: Error while decrypting data. If you changed encryption settings in another browser, **update your settings** in this browser too. Or try to import settings. And if you did not change anything, **try to login** again.

backup.title: Backup Data
backup.content: Please, before proceeding to the next step, download your backup file. It contains decrypted previous data of changed profiles. Keep it in a safe place.
backup.next: Procceed without downloading the backup file

profile.confirm remove: Profile **{{profile}}** will be removed with all the data, including notes, tags, and notebooks. This action is irreversible!

notes.confirm trash: The note **{{title}}** will be moved to trash.
notes.confirm remove: The note **{{title}}** will be removed **for ever**!
notes.create and attach: Create a new note and attach its link
notes.hyperlink-dialog: Title of a note or URL

notebooks.name: Please, provide notebook's name
notebooks.confirm remove: The notebook **{{name}}** will be removed **for ever**!

tags.name: Tag name is required
tags.confirm remove: The tag **{{name}}** will be removed **for ever**!

dropbox.auth confirm: Now you will be redirected to **Dropbox** authorization page.> Please click **OK** button.
dropbox.api info 1: You can have your own API key on
dropbox.api info 2: When you create a new app at Dropbox's Developer site you should keep in mind that:
dropbox.api info li 1: Type of API should be **Dropbox API**
dropbox.api info li 2: Type of access should be **App Folder**

help.firststart import: If you have already used Laverna before, you can import your old settings by clicking on 'import' button bellow.
help.firststart next: If you have never used Laverna before, click on 'next' button to start installation process.
help.firststart encryption: If you want to use encryption, please, provide encryption password.
help.firststart sync: Since we don't store any data on our servers, you need to enable synchronization with one of the adapters to be able to view your notes on other devices.
help.firststart backup: Everything is almost ready. You can download your settings backup and proceed to the last step.
